name: Occulye (Prototype)
description:
Background Information

On a casual Saturday, you awake to noises. Loud bangs of wood near your farm vibrate throughout your home. On further investigation, you discover something you wish you hadn't.

Occuleye was created as a demo game for the Madvent 3 Calendar. We are working on a full release and is expected 3rd quarter of 2023.

https://hauntedps1.itch.io/madvent3

JOIN OUR DISCORD FOR UPDATES.

https://discord.gg/CKbuF4jBke
